summary: Two weeks ago, Zeta Station ceased all communications without sending any distress call beforehand. Investigative officer Lieutenant Essex is sent to this isolated moon to determine what has happened to the crew.

name: Zenith Falls
summary:
Zenith Falls is a multiplayer MMO, hack and slash, exploration game where players take on the role of new age explorers, traveling by means of airships around a sunken world, forced to gather artifacts from the Lunar Towers which are towers of unknown origin that remain from forgotten times. Travel alone or with a team across the sunken world to find new gear, attack other players, uncover secret knowledge or start a new land!
Players start off in Lunar City, a detached community of survivors that live on the tallest of the Lunar Towers, though the city is small it has become a safe haven for survivors around the sunken world.

name: Zero Core: Exile
summary: Shoot everyone to keep your butt safe.

name: Zeroed
summary: Soar across vast landscapes and battle opponents with a unique take on flight combat racing. Get ready to break the sound barrier in this deceptively simple game that will always be a challenge, so buckle up and get Zeroed!

name: Zero City: Try to Survive
summary: Zero City is an online simulator game that features a refuge populated with survivors. Your goal is to create the mightiest squad, develop your base, and raise up new survivors to oppose other players and various infected mobs that inhabit nearby areas.

name: Zecha Tactics
summary: Zecha Tactics is a blend of Mecha tactics, story driven RPG, and mercenary outfit management.

name: Zeepkist
summary: Zeepkist is a bright and colorful physics based soapbox racing game, with up to 4-player split-screen multiplayer and an integrated level editor.

name: Zero Idle
summary: Zero IDLE is an incremental (IDLE) game in which you can decide whether to make all of your way to the biggest number EVER by clicking, or by increasing your incremental production...or you can make the game to click for you...

name: Zelda II: End of Day
summary: A great return for true nostalgic Zelda II lovers! Return after 30 years with a new path and search for 6 new guarded palaces to place the crystals on statues in order to break the long sleep of Princess Zelda!

name: Zen World
summary: Relaxing world-building game where you create miniature landscape patch by patch, trying to create a perfect world for its little resident people and their kingdoms. Zen World is your personal little continent-sized relaxing garden, and it's up to you to make it grow and flourish!

name: Zen Dynamics
summary:
Zen Dynamics is a 2005 ZDoom partial conversion created by Xaser. It was created to demonstrate an implementation of weapon reloading in ZDoom, 7 years before it was officially and fully implemented as a weapon state. The game also includes features such selecting and deselecting frames, cutscenes, new monsters, new levels, new sounds, and 13 new weapons. Most of the levels are based on unfinished levels created by Malcolm Sailor which were released in 2000 in the "Assorted Scraps and Leftovers" collection.

At the 13th Annual Cacowards, this WAD was listed as a runner-up alongside Oniria.

name: Zenith: The Last City
summary: Fight, craft, explore, and lose yourself in a massively multiplayer world built for VR. Forge alliances and friendships in guilds and parties. Join epic raids and world events, and blaze your own path. How will you use your power?

name: Zero: Circle of Flow
summary: A RPG visual novel that was the first product in the "Zero Project" which consists of manhwas and light novels.

name: Zero Hour
summary: Zero Hour is a tactical FPS with online team-based game play that takes place in a variety of fictional locations interpreted in Bangladesh with Real-life scale & resource management. It brings a grounded, close quarter combat experience to the game.

name: Zen and the Art of Transhumanism
summary: A cyberpunk pottery game about improving the human race through technology.

name: Zeus Quest Remastered
summary: 'Zeus Quests Remastered' is a silly point and click adventure game with light-hearted humour. It combines Greek Mythology with Sci-Fi in a twisted way! You control Zeus (Boss of Olympus) which is a wacky character. He tries to fix a time machine to save the planet from explosion. Everything happens in Greek mythology timeframe. The characters and dialogues are silly and translated into 6 languages. There is English Voice over in some cut scenes. We use Vector art, a unique cartoonish style. Zeus, the boss of Olympus is summoned back to earth by an ancient security mechanism. The story starts with Zeus flying his spaceship and landing it in the bottom of the Santorini Ocean. In Santorini he will interact with dozens of crazy characters and solve many smart puzzles. The game is big, full length. He will visit Oia, Akrotiri, Fira, Caldera, Volcano and many more places until he finally discovers his super weapon, the thunder and the time machine box. But even then the task is far from over, he will have to set sail to another cluster of Greek islands, Milos, Karpathos, Mykonos and Delos. There he has to find the scattered pieces of the time machine so that he can use it to save the planet. There he will even abduct Europe transformed into a bull (mythology) and take her to Minoan Crete in the Knossos timeframe. There he will enter the famous labyrinth of Knossos, go to Festos and find the missing pieces to complete the mission.

name: Zero-Point
summary: Zero-Point is a 3D space roguelike inspired by the indie hit FTL: Faster Than Light. Take control of a cruiser-sized spaceship crewed with up to 4 starting crew members, and travel through many regions of hostile space on your mission to save the Star Federation.

name: Zero Wrath Vendetta
summary: Dodge enemy beams with your space fighter, kill huge bosses, and sing along to seven distinct songs in this unique rock opera videogame.

name: Zenith Frontier
summary: Zenith Frontier is a simulation-strategy game about the exploration and colonisation of space. Experience visionary strategic gameplay set in an evolving procedural galaxy populated by billions of autonomous citizens and private companies.

name: Zenkoku Baken Ouja Ketteisen
summary: Zenkoku Baken Ouja Ketteisen is a first Derby Stallion 96 compatible horse racing game for Satellaview with Nintendo Breeders Cup.

name: Zenkoku Baken Ouja Ketteisen 2
summary: Zenkoku Baken Ouja Ketteisen 2 is a second Derby Stallion 96 compatible horse racing game for Satellaview with Nintendo Breeders Cup.

name: Zeko
summary: A calm and cute original puzzle game. Clear stages to unlock the next one. Each stage has its own challenge.

name: Zero-G Gunfight
summary: A 2D arena shooter set in outer space where you use your guns to move and kill each other! Prepare yourself for the fast paced arenas of Zer0-G Gunfight where only the best will survive and bring their nations one set closer to intergalactic supremacy!

name: Zen! Slider
summary: A minimalistic puzzle game where you will have to use all of your brain capacity to pass the levels.

name: Zero-G Revolution
summary: A single player sci-fi Adventure game for VR device.

name: Zero Hour
summary: A game made in 2009 and released in 2021 in itch.io's Indie Bundle for Palestinian Aid.

name: Zelda
summary:
Zelda is a multiscreen Game & Watch game that was only released in English as a stand-alone system pre-loaded with the single game. It has dual screens which fold in a clamshell design, similar to the Nintendo DS. It was re-released as part of the Nintendo Mini Classics line in 1998 and 2007. The complete game can also be unlocked in Game & Watch Gallery 4 for the Game Boy Advance and Wii U Virtual Console.

Its core formula is based on that of the original The Legend of Zelda, where Link must fight through eight dungeons and obtain the eight shards of the Triforce of Wisdom. However, it bears more gameplay similarities to The Adventure of Link, since it is 2D and from a side-on perspective. The game features an original, though minimal storyline.

name: Zelda 1 / Metroid 1 Combo Randomizer
summary:
This is a combination randomizer for the original NES Legend of Zelda and Metroid games.

The randomizer combines the two classics into a unified gaming experience, which allows gameplay to seamlessly switch from one game to the other via special portals added to each game. In addition, equipment and items from each game are shuffled across both worlds, creating a unique challenge where you aren't just completing one game and then the other, but one where you will have to transition between them several times in order to finish both.

name: Zenko: A Fox's Tale
summary: Zenko: A Fox's tale is a 3D adventure platformer that takes place in a Japanese inspired environment. A whimsical fox must move between realms to capture wandering spirits, discover new abilities, and restore an abandoned shrine.

name: Zephon
summary: Zephon is a post-apocalyptic 4X strategy game built on Proxy’s unique tactical combat system. Guide survivors through a grimdark future, navigating unexpected disasters, eldritch horror and cyberpunk monstrosities. What will you do to survive?

name: Zeta Bit Player Pack 1
summary: Zeta Bit Player Pack 1 is a collection of different top-down games, idol defender is a heavenly tower defense game. protect your temple and don't let heathens get in. Blue world is a top-down semi rouge-like where you use status effects to defeat your foes. Rouge Shooter is a rouge-like topdown shooter where you face waves of enemies with a chance of a bounty hunter coming to ruin your pursuit. into the cyber flesh is a top-down twin-stick shooter that takes place when humanity resorts to shelter to seal humanity off from the man and metal demons outside.

name: Zero Infinity: Devil of Maxwell
summary: In 1968, the city of Yahiro had undergone rapid development after the war. Ryouga lives with his imouto Takane, accepting everything that happens in life as he believes that everything in the world exists for a reason. After meeting a man Rei who did not remember anything but his own name and helping him out, they became friends. Later when Ryouga found Rei being beat up, he tried to help but instead got caught up in the battle-to-the-death world of the Imaginators, individuals who have machine hearts that make them into super-powered beings.

name: Zeriliah Chronicles
summary: Experience an epic adventure alongside Vairon the young intrepid warrior. The terrible Floubyhs decided to invite themselves to the village of Yatapah and kidnap someone. What is Vairon's goal in this whole story ? Save the kidnaped villager and return to enjoy his birthday in peace.

name: ZenFarm
summary: Relax and farm in the perfect world inside of ZenFarm game. Zen is for finding inner piece and harmony during your hard days in this beautiful farming game. Find your ZEN during farming!

name: Zenorost Realm
summary: A fantasy-life simulator in procedurally-generated worlds where every creature has its own role and where you can be whatever you want

name: ZeroChance
summary: We try to survive by killing the creatures we encounter in each level.

name: Zeltrus
summary: Zeltrus is a fresh take on the puzzle-platformer genre about Obis, a young boy who finds himself trapped in the basement of a building. Help Obis complete challenges, uncover secrets and put an end to this with only his grenades to protect him.

name: Zero Plan
summary: 《依澪》是一款恐怖解谜像素游戏。在游戏中玩家将操控谜之少女”澪“或神秘男人”玖“ ，在这个怪物横行的意识世界里找到世界崩坏的真相并生存下去。

name: Zerowood
summary: Zerowood is a 2D action game, where you play as a young man who has to save his parents from dangerous aliens. Use various weapons and fighting techniques to become the hero in this special action game.

name: Zeliria Sanctuary II: Xinori Asylum
summary: The adventures of Maxx, Humkey and their friends continue! Is Zeliria really a kind of sanctuary? Who invaded the empty planet, failing to wake the absolute weapon sleeping in its bowels? The continuation of the fascinating history Zeliria Sanctuary is already waiting for you!

name: Zerone 2D
summary: An abstract arcade game with dozens of relaxing levels and optional challenges.

name: Zephyrus
summary: Cooperative action-puzzler in virtual reality.

name: Zelda Chuánshuō: Sān Shén Zhī lì
summary: Zelda Chuánshuō: Sān Shén Zhī lì is a bootleg game developed by Mars Production and published by Waixing for the Famicom. It is a backport of The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past for the SNES.

name: Zenbones
summary: A pure version of the traditional tile-matching game. No added flavours.

name: Zen Cube
summary: Zen Cube a game where your hobby will be your greatest fun. The Zen cube arose from the idea of the Zen Chess game that allows the player to perform only the checkmate of the chess move, with the Zen Cube you can make the last 2 moves to finish the Magic Cube.

name: Zen Shards
summary:
Zen Shards is a relaxing and pleasingly simple idle game. Recommended to unwind and for stress relief.

Watch the sparks, little arrows, dash around and transform the colors of geometric shapes as they collide with them. Create more, merge them into stronger ones, purchase upgrades and unlock more stuff as the game gradually unfolds, while numbers rise into the gazillions and beyond.

Relaxing and stress-free. There is no competition and no direct challenge, you will explore and progress in your own pace, at your own time.

name: Zen: A Gay Sequel
summary: Zen: A Gay Sequel (ZAGS) is a gay, planner-focused, stat-based, dating sim set in college. It is a full sequel to YAGS.

name: Zero-based World
summary: Zero Based World is a multiplayer sandbox survival game.

name: Zenith Into Maronarium
summary: Pilot the Kotel One aircraft. Survive the samozbor invasion.

name: Zero4 Champ
summary: The first game in a Japanese drag racing series that contains RPG elements.

name: Zee.End
summary: A secret organization makes a critical mistake in the development of chemical weapons. As a result, the entire population of the Montib island is infected with an unknown virus. You need to survive among zombies on a huge 20x20 km map.

name: Zeliria Sanctuary: Isle's Memories
summary: DLC "Memories of Islay" - a terrible story full of scary pumpkins and, suddenly, very "spicy" moments. Nightmarish pleasures to you!

name: Z: Escape - Aftermath
summary: Test or prepare yourself against the main villains.

name: Zeliria Sanctuary: Rise of Pumpkins
summary: More adventures of Special Forces soldier Maxx on a distant planet Zeliria.

name: Zerone
summary: Zerone is a PC-based high-quality VR game, and it is a Hyper FPS game that competes with the enemy units of the mechanic series.

name: Zen Trails
summary: Zen Trails is a relaxing, simple sand box in which you can do only one thing: draw lines. When you press play, the lines rotate to create beautiful designs. A zen-inducing spirograph-making experience to calm the soul while stimulating the mind.

name: Zelda's Birthday
summary: Zelda's Birthday is a mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time - Master Quest. It features all new actor arrangements, all new text and story line, 3 totally redesigned dungeons, an optional side quest, endings (plural), and hidden goodies.

name: Zero Caliber: Reloaded
summary:
Grab your favourite guns, customize them and experience action like you never have before!
Rise through the ranks to unlock a wide variety of weapons and attachments, climb, jump, crouch, shoot, reload, repeat - be prepared for a mind-blowingly immersive experience!

You'll find yourself in a war-ridden, dystopian United States as a newly enlisted OSA soldier. What does OSA stand for? Outer States of America, the last bastion of hope.
Narrative-driven missions along the way to your ultimate goal: saving humanity.

name: Zen Pinball Party
summary: Zen Pinball Party delivers the ultimate pinball experience with carefully crafted tables that are inspired by some of the biggest brands from DreamWorks Animation and Hasbro, as well as popular pinball classic themes. Players will challenge their friends and family for the highest score on fun and unique tables.

name: Zeroed Out
summary: A brain teaser where all you need to do is stay away from a zero. Not as easy as it sounds!

name: Zenith
summary: A game mentioned in a number of interviews, and developed by DMA Design. It featured a variety of human and alien characters racing to the top of high towers. The game was eventually dropped so DMA Design could focus on its Body Harvest and GTA projects.

name: Zero Racers
summary:
Also known as G-Zero, Zero Racers would have been the first 3D entry in the F-Zero series. With the F-Zero Grand Prix over, racers now take part in the high-thrill, zero-gravity G-Zero Grand Prix races.

The racers effectively fly around the 3D wireframe circuits. Three of the original racers were confirmed to return (Falcon, Stingray and Goose), and joined by a new craft, Origammy.

A prototype of the game was shown at E3 1996, and it was previewed by Nintendo Power magazine. However, by 1996 the Virtual Boy was already considered a failure and was discontinued shortly after. The game was later announced for release through Virtual Boy Nintendo Classics.

name: Zenith's Call
summary: ZENITH'S CALL is an upcoming online tactical-MORPG for Windows PC. It features elements from mainstays of the genre, while incorporating everything you have come to expect from massive multiplayer games. You will be able to journey across a massive world, slay monsters, tackle quests and do it all with your friends or trek solo! We're making sure we keep the story hard encoded into the game-play, to ensure we have an engaging tale for all players to follow.

name: Zero Volt X
summary: Manage your ship power distribution while avoiding thousands of bullets!

name: Zero Velocity
summary: Mine your way out of the Black Hole!

name: Zeitgeist
summary: Equipped with your pot plant companion, travel through the roots of time delving into the past and present depths of an ancient submerged city. Exploring grand halls, navigating between walls, and taking advantage of ancient mechanisms on your mission to steal the heart of the city.

name: Zeta Wolf Chronicles
summary: "Date" one of four girls on the path to enlightenment. Prom awaits. Will you be led astray by an old crush? The realistic dating-sim that "teaches" through its gameplay. Follow Rayen, a young disillusioned teen as he attempts to romance girls based on e-book tutorials. Will desperation win out in this desire for love, or will knowledge, patience, and logic pave the way to success?

name: Zeta Wing
summary: A vertical SHMUP for the C64

name: Zen
summary: A chill little puzzle game. Just watch the moving spheres and the paths they leave behind to discover the hidden word.

name: Zemeroth
summary: An open-source turn-based tactical game

name: Zen L'Initié
summary: Zen L'Initié is a small chess game.

name: Zero G Golf
summary: Space travel is boring; let's play golf!

name: Zero Sievert
summary: Zero Sievert is a tense top-down shooter that challenges you to scavenge a procedurally-generated wasteland, loot gear, and explore what’s left of a devastated world. When the odds are stacked against you, you’ll need to do more than just survive...

name: Zephyr: The Cloud Odyssey
summary: Collect ancient artifacts by teleporting through floating islands in this fast-paced action platformer.

name: Ze Field
summary: Help a zebra get his stripes

name: Zest & Goop
summary: A tower defence game with a twist. Made for Ludum Dare 39.

name: Zero Memory
summary: Test your long term and short term memory in a simple little game called Zero Memory.

name: Zen Match
summary: A nature inspired match-3 game with relaxing music. Unlock tiles and backgrounds as you progress. Also collect tokens to decorate rooms and create your own zen spaces.

name: Zero Comico
summary:
Zero Comico is an Italian video game featuring three famous Italian comedians: Aldo Giovanni and Giacomo as the main characters.

The player is in control of all three characters as they try to free the world from an evil force that has taken control over mankind through television.
The game features a variety of puzzles with a comedy theme.

name: Zed's Alchemy
summary: You have only four basic elements: Fire, Water, Earth and Air. Combine them and their products to get more than 200 new elements. You can create a Life, Beer, Vampires, Skyscrapers and much more..

name: Zeno
summary:
Zeno is a psychological horror puzzle adventure game. Scenario-centered, the difficulty of puzzle solving is low.
Losing memories and waking up from a mysterious place, a genius and a homicidal maniac, Maeno Aki and Tsugino Haru.
These two who are handcuffed together, aim for the exit to escape from this place―

name: zeMa
summary: Take a look at electronics from the inside. There are copper conductors, resistors, inductors, diodes and capacitors. This is a spherical maze. It is very easy to get lost. Let's get rid of all the foreign objects. Caution! High voltage!

name: Zenite
summary: Hero, Furtive and Brute trained for four years. Now, the destruction of Inbrazed Village will be heroic, furtive or brutally avenged. But it depends on the focus on the goal and, who knows, maybe find, arrive or reach the zenith...

name: Zenteni
summary: Build, conquer and collect puzzles.

name: Zeppelin: Escape Room
summary: Escape the impending death by restarting Zeppelin systems and fleeing the dying planet. Cooperative Escape Room game to challenge yourself and your friends. Get out of confinement, solve amazing and challenging mysteries before the timer runs out!

name: Zero Chastity: A Sultry Summer Holiday
summary: Zero Chastity: A Sultry Summer Holiday brings you a summer of sex under the sun with four unique & sexy heroines with art from legendary hentai artist, Mizuryu Kei! This game is based off the popular eromanga series of the same title and is both fully-voiced and uncensored.

name: Zero Escape
summary:
A fun and engaging puzzle game with 100 levels.
Can you solve each floor's puzzle to escape zero?
Beat the time challenge to earn hint credits.
A retro text based puzzler that will keep you guessing.
You wake up in a dark room lit only by the green glow of a keypad. You notice an elevator door and touch the keypad hoping to escape. It reveals a cryptic puzzle. Good luck!

name: Zemblanity
summary: Zemblanity is an atmospheric first-person horror game. What seemed like a little creepy invitation over from an old childhood friend turns into disturbing uncovering of mysterious forces ruling in the mansion. Will you find a way out?

name: Zelda 2 Redux
summary:
Have you always tried to play through Zelda II and finding out it was either excruciatingly difficulty, unbalanced, too tough or perhaps found that it just has so many quirks that doesn’t make the game enjoyable?

This hack tries to address that by rebalancing the game, making some QoL changes and also some visual flare into the game, without compromising the original game’s design.

name: Zerstorer
summary: This partial conversion is quite old now, released in 1997. This 6 SP map episode, also including a start map, end map, cutscenes, and 5 DM maps, has stood the test of time as one of the most atmospheric experiences available. Using the episode's additions to full effect, Zerstörer has an atmosphere of unparalleled bleakness and inhospitality - and sometimes outright scariness. In this way, it enhances the dark, gothic aspects of Quake.

name: Zetria
summary: Zetria is a pixel/retro style platformer with action and puzzle elements. Help Solana jump, shoot and think her way through the perils and dangers ahead to rescue the missing facility workers!There are nine levels in total, and a few secret areas to find and unlock too.

name: Zen Wars
summary: Build your base, place your cannons and attack! Zen Wars is a fast paced strategy-puzzle defense game that challenges players to build, repair and destroy the enemy! Defeat Lord Evilz' army in single player mode, compete in intense 2 and 3 player online battles and become the ultimate Zen Master!

name: Zenless Zone Zero
summary: Zenless Zone Zero is an all-new 3D action game from HoYoverse, here to provide a thrilling combat experience. Build a squad of up to three and begin your assault with Basic and Special Attacks. Dodge and Parry to neutralize your opponents' counterattacks, and when they're Stunned, unleash a powerful combo of Chain Attacks to finish them off! Remember, different opponents have different traits, and it would be prudent to use their weaknesses to your advantage.

name: Zerocron
summary: Zerocron is a straightforward, classical arcade Twin-Stick Shoot-Em-Up with a strong Commodore-Amiga-era feel. Blast asteroids and enemies to burning pixeldust!

name: Zeus Quest: The Rebirth of Earth
summary: Help Zeus save the planet in one heck of a crazy and hilarious family adventure. A classic point and click adventure game safe for kids. It combines Greek Mythology with Sci-Fi in a funny way!

name: Zelda Heardle
summary:
A daily Zelda music guessing game!

Each Zelda Heardle is randomly chosen from Zelda soundtracks.

name: Zero Losses
summary:
Zero Losses is a short open-world driving adventure game with horror elements and a hollow atmosphere in the set inspired by the events of the Russo-Ukrainian War.

You play as a contract serviceman of a support battalion, not participating in the events on the frontline, but working in a chain of supplies behind it. While your other comrades defend The Motherland by expanding its borders, you follow them, arriving at the liberated scorched earth. For long days at the wheel of a truck, you drive through the deserted streets of dead cities and villages, diligently avoiding explosion craters while the empty orbits of broken windows are watching you.

name: Zero Tolerance Underground
summary: A previously unreleased sequel to Zero Tolerance available in QUByte Classics Zero Tolerance Collection. Battle through ten floors of alien mayhem to stop plans for an impending invasion!

name: Zebra Evolution
summary: Match zebras and gain money creating mutant animals

name: ZEQ2 Lite
summary: An open-source DBZ fangame with a focus on making it easy for users to mod without programming knowledge.

name: Zekkyou Senshi: Sakeburein
summary: Zekkyō Senshi Sakeburein was a Nintendo DS game exclusively available to Club Nintendo members in Japan. This quirky multiplayer beat'em up forced players to attack by shouting key phrases into the DS' built-in microphone.

name: Zero World
summary: Gather resources, craft items, kill others, raid houses, but don't get raided yourself

name: Zefyr: A Thief's Melody
summary: In a colorful archipelago, play as Eïko, a young thief studying at the Guild. Investigate kidnappings, steer clear of roaming pirates or fight them. Sail the ocean on a cute turtle and climb every island. Cure sick animals, and find the truth during this feel-good journey.

name: Zero Ops
summary: A classic 3rd Person Mobile Shooter. Gone are the days of "run and gun". This game rewards those who rely on tactics, teamwork, and stealth. Join up with your teammates in this 5v5 intense mobile shooter.

name: Zelda II: Amida's Curse
summary:
One day Link finds a portal to a strange land. Curious he starts exploring the magical world of Amida. Little does he know, that he’s on a brand new adventure that will take him to places he couldn’t have imagined. Amida has a deep emotional link to our hero. Can Link unravel the secrets of Amida and return to his own world?

Zelda II – Amida’s Curse is a brand new Zelda II adventure. The game has been build up from the ground. With a new world, new graphics and an original soundtrack by bentglasstube. The focus of Amida’s Curse lies on exploration above combat. Gameplay has been altered to make this, above all, a fun gaming experience. So, difficulty is lower than the original Zelda II, there are no cheap deaths and grinding isn’t necessary.

name: Zelda II: The Nightmare of Ganon
summary:
The Nightmare of Ganon is a complete redesign of the NES game Zelda II with new story, overworld, caves, palaces, towns, item order, random encounters, and more.

It’s a hardtype and more challenging then the original game. Enemies don’t take more hits then usual, the difficulty lies more in the design.

It’s much longer because of a bigger overworld which has more caves and bridges. There are longer caves and deeper palaces.

There are a couple custom changes to gameplay which include enemies that respawn & you can restart at the palace if you game over.

This romhack will give a feeling like it’s a totally new Zelda II game because none of the design is similar to the original.

name: Zen Golf
summary: Zen Golf is a relaxing and chill mini golf experience. Get lost in the beautiful zen gardens and all original lo-fi Japanese soundtrack with up to 20 friends on over 180 levels! Or play against state of the art AI opponents for rewarding and fun solo play.

name: Zeltoid X1
summary: Help Zeltoid to save his planet by exploring the galaxy in search of zitoride, essential energy for life, craft new abilities, solve strange puzzles and find the reason for the mysterious disappearance of zitoride in the galaxy.

name: Zed Zone
summary: A great catastrophe has come, and you, who are on duty, crash and trapped in a Zed Zone. There are zombies and monsters everywhere, In order to escape, by collecting materials, upgrading skills, building shelters, defeating zombie waves and mysterious mechs, chasing a glimmer of hope.

name: Zero Orders Tactics
summary: Terraforming + Into The Breach! An experimental puzzle strategy where you are not commanding your troops - now, you are shaping the battlefield itself! Nothing is random, everything is predictable, and the battlefield is changing. Every turn. By you.

name: Zero Page
summary: Your life depends on a machine that struggles to count higher than 256. But with a little bit of BASIC and a lot of cunning, you may just live long enough to escape a dying spaceship with a mind of its own. Let's hope eight bits are enough.

name: Zelda III: Hyrule Explorer
summary:
As everyone knows, ALttP enforces a very linear order of the dungeons (at least until you’ve played a large part of the game). This minimizes the exploration aspect to a large extend. The goal of this hack is to remove the linearity as much as possible, without changing anything substantial. In fact, the author very much aimed at the changes being completely unnoticeable if not invisible.

Obviously, it would not make sense to allow access to everything at any time. There are a few necessary “sync points” for the story: Link needs all pendants to get the Master Sword, to fight Aghanim, to transfer to the Dark World. Link needs all crystals to access Ganon’s tower. Etc. Thus the goal is to allow an “as arbitrary as possible” order for getting the crystals and pendants, respectively.

name: Zen
summary: Zen is an innovative puzzler with original gameplay that combines precision, reaction and inventiveness. Your goal is to guide the ball though a labyrinth towards the gates, avoiding collision with sparkling blocks. Move the ball using combination and sequence of waves, the number of which is limited for each level, so make sure to choose the shortest way. And cut corners.

name: Zellige: The Tilemaker of Granada
summary: Zellige : The Tilemaker of Granada is a meditative and relaxing historical game, set in medieval Al-Andalus, where you play as a skilled tilemaker and design intricate Islamic mosaic patterns to decorate a merchant family's palace. Let your creativity flow and create beautiful patterns !

name: Zettai Meikyuu Grimm Director's Cut: Nanatsu no Kagi to Rakuen no Otome
summary: Adds new stories and CGs not included in the PSP release.

name: Zero Division
summary: A roguelite deckbuilder crossed with a CCG, set in a dark cyberpunk world. Assemble a crew of three operators, each with their own unique deck. Augment their abilities, explore a shattered city, and guide them in combat against powerful bosses.

name: Zeeverse
summary: Zeeverse is a creator platform built on top of a blockchain-based game centered around a vast collection of unique little creatures called ZEE NFTs. Collect and battle more than 250+ different ZEE kinds with unlimited variations. Each unique, each only yours. In Zeeverse you explore various dungeons, hunt for treasures, battle epic bosses with friends, battle other players, build and farm on your lands, discover treasures, and travel Zeeverse to discover epic adventures.

name: Zettai Kaikyuu Gakuen Shiawase-iro no Tobira
summary: Successfully crowdfunded and officially announced on Sweet Princess vol. 27.

name: Zelda's Ballad
summary: Zelda's Ballad is a mod of The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild! Everything has been completely changed: the character, the voice, the animations, the hair physics, the dialogues, the different costumes and armors, the menu, the icons, etc.

name: Zed
summary: Zed is an android. But unlike other androids, he has always had a very special dream to sport a space suit entirely made of gold. It's now up to you to guide Zed through ten levels and collect enough gold pieces to fulfill his dream. Your quest begins in the Gold mines, deep down in the underworld. Play Zed game online on your mobile phone, tablet or computer.

name: Zentris
summary: Place block shapes to create and clear full vertically and horizontally lines on the game board in an infinite race for a better High Score. Keep your board clear and take your time. Stay focused as blocks start to stack up and use your boosters strategically.

name: Zero Visibility
summary: A chilling cosmic horror game about four friends that get lost in a blizzard.

name: Zero Gravity
summary: Zero Gravity is an early B&W arcade game for Macintosh, in which you try to center your floating character in the center of the gravity chamber. A white dot appears to indicate where the gravity force is currently applied and you move accordingly to stay away from the chamber's sides.

name: Zen Pinball Party: My Little Pony Pinball
summary: Visit Twilight Sparkle and her friends as they begin preparations for the largest party Equestria has ever seen! Play everypony's mane mode to start the Wizard Mode, and lock balls into the Tree of Harmony for a spectacular 6-ball multiball!

name: Zealot
summary: You have been summoned by your Masters to perform the final ritual atop the Eternal Peak. Survive hordes from the space between the stars, using your reflexes and shooting skills until the Ritual is complete. Do not fail your Masters.

name: Zettai Zetsumei kara no Dasshutsu: Nazotoki Quiz Illustration Suiri Mystery Game
Zen Games: Color Blocks Puzzle
summary:
Color Block Puzzle by Zen Games is a simple puzzle game for phones and tablets. This game has been built for stress relief. No rush, no hurry - a simple color blocks puzzle with no score or time limit. In this version of Zen games we have added 100 levels from easy to difficult. The game can be played by all ages by just moving the multi color blocks to match adjacent color and find your Zen.
Color Block Puzzle will improve your logic, coordination and help you relax with a soothing music as you cross each level moving color blocks and matching them. We have designed this zen game with soothing colours and happy music with a thought of helping you unwind.

name: Zero to Hero
summary: Zero to Hero is a roguelike tactics game where you play a contestant on a 1960s game show. You get super powers, and have to overcome a gauntlet of challenges. If you get to the end, you get to keep your powers. Choose amazing upgrades and incredible transformations to go from Zero to Hero!

name: Zero-G-Racer
summary: FPV arcade simulator, drone racing with onboard weapons and ammo for fun piloting. Real-life driving scenarios for the simulator side.

name: Zeo Effect
summary: Zeo effect is a top down shooter with rogue-lite elements, global map and item accumulation where time runs only when you take action. This allows you to adapt to the situation at a comfortable rhythm and destroy enemies with an extensive arsenal of weapons.

name: Zelda3
summary: An open-source reimplementation of The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past for the PC and other platforms. It requires an original ROM of the game to extract its assets, and has some enhancements like a widescreen support and higher framerate.

name: Zebra Logic Master
summary: Do you belong to the only 2% of the world population that is able to solve Einstein's Puzzle? Discover here!

name: Zenkai
summary: Shooting game developed by Hiroshi Asano.

name: Zenfit
summary:
A beautifully simple idea, seconds to learn but with a challenge that will last days.
Rotate and flip shapes of the same colour to match them together. Thousands of different screens at eight levels that you can dip into and tackle at your own pace. Can you beat the target score?

name: ZeroVector
summary: ZeroVector is an endless retro arcade vertical shoot ‘em up! Blast your way through endless waves of enemy ships seeing how long you can survive and what high score you can achieve. There are four different bosses to encounter, each with their own firing patterns and strategies to beat.

name: Zen Pong
summary: Are you trying to find some games, which you can play alone without friends? Zen pong is the right game for you.

name: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link Randomizer
summary: A ROM Randomizer for the NES classic Zelda II: The Adventure of Link.

name: Zeldo's Challenge Ch. 1: Bingo's Revenge
summary: This game is then the first entry in ZeldoRetro’s series Le Défi de Zeldo (Zeldo’s Challenge). This first chapter is named La Revanche du Bingo (Bingo’s Revenge), and is much less ambitious than its sequel. It contains only one dungeon, and no overworld to explore, which makes the game rather short.

name: Zeldo's Challenge Ch. 2: The Tower of Memories
summary: The action of the game is located in Takapa’s County, at the west of High-rule. Link is free to go directly to the Tower of Memories to try Zeldo’s Challenge or explore this brand new world. The game is in the same vein than ALTTP but with in wackier universe than the typical Legend of Zelda games, to which multiple video games characters join, and lots of references.

name: Zeus: God of Lightning
summary: Discover the legendary story of Zeus in this fun narrative game, as you complete all the missions. You will have to secure the reign, while you travel and rescue your brothers.

name: Zero Lilium Bloom
summary: Explore cycles of growth and transformation in a vibrant world full of life and surprises. With relaxing cultivation simulation, action-packed exploration, stunning graphics, immersive sound, and intuitive gameplay.

name: Zero Fire: Toaplan Arcade Garage
summary:
Zero Fire includes Zero Wing and Hellfire, the collection will also include the Toaplan-developed side-scrolling run-and-gun bonus game Demon’s World.

Experience full ports of the Toaplan-developed side-scrolling shoot ’em ups Zero Wing and Hellfire, which first launched in arcades in the 1980s, complete with extras. Each game has a “Player 1 and Player 2 Alternating Version” and “Player 1 and Player 2 Simultaneous Play Version” with its own game balance adjustments. The overseas versions of each game are also playable.

Includes also new “Super Easy” and “Arcade Challenge” modes.

name: Zelda's Adventure
summary:
In the 1990s Nintendo made a deal with Philips to develop 3 Zelda titles. The first 2 were side scrolling platformers, similar to Zelda II, and the third was a traditional top-down action adventure game.

Zelda’s Adventure looked interesting and it would be fun to play on a portable system. The Game Boy was chosen because of the existing Zelda games on the system.

The game sticks to the aesthetics of Link’s Awakening, but also incorporates some features from Oracle of Ages and Oracle of Seasons.

This is a complete port of the CDi original and was developed in GB Studio, with a few modifications.

name: Zelda: Meadow of Shadows
summary: Meadow of Shadows is a short hack of the Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past made under an 18 hour timer as apart of a challenge between myself, JaredBrian, Letterbomb, and Zarby89. The game features three dungeons and a final gauntlet area. It showcases the abilities of the ZScream editor and acts as a prequel to the upcoming Oracle of Secrets ROM hack.

name: Zero Grounds
summary: Zero Grounds is a dynamic free-to-play online multiplayer FPS with a unique feature: no gravity areas! Team up with your friends, customize the loadout, and float (not pay) to win!

name: Zelda: Interconnected Strongholds
summary: This hack has a small overworld, but it is filled to the brim with every item in the game along with 9 dungeons in total. Every single cave and house is redesigned, and there are a bunch of graphic edits and palette changes. As with 18 Hours Past, there’s kind of a story set in place but it’s not the main focus of the game. There are some custom events though that relate to the story, so the creator at least tried to put more of a story in.

name: Zenful Journey
summary: Step into a world of serenity and tranquility with Zenful Journey, the ultimate walking simulator for those seeking a moment of calm in their day. This zen-themed game invites you to explore a beautiful forest at your own pace, ticking off items on your list as you go.

name: Zewels
summary:
Zewels is an addictive puzzle game experience that breaks the mold of classic puzzle games.
In Zewels Puzzle RPG, you'll need to use all your skill and intelligence to beat progressively tougher levels.
Combine gems to win magical power-ups and blast your way to victory.
Starting at level 0, there are a total of 20 levels, and 4 modes: three single player and one multiplayer.
As you gain more experience, you'll have an ever-greater advantage over your opponents.
To reach level 20, you'll need to pass a series of challenging tests in all four modes.
You can also enhance your abilities with Super Powers and Super Combos that will help you achieve maximum control of your mental powers.

name: Zeta
summary: Zeta is an adventure game with light dungeon crawling elements. The star ship Pilgrims is sent to investigate an accident on the planet Z (or Zeta-3) in the Zeta star system, and find out what happened to the first investigation team sent earlier, and to search for the lost transport ship Sanctuary.

name: Zelda3: IQ Test - Revenge of the Einstein
summary:
The final installment of the IQ series, The Revenge of the Einstein, includes some of the most difficult block puzzles ever created in a Zelda game. The already existing puzzles from the IQ and Conker, which were considered to be of a better design, were used in this game and remodeled to be even more difficult, yet some rare puzzles are brand new.

A very short hack with very difficult riddles, which will test the limits of your intellect, while still being beatable if you invest enough time into solving. The hack also has some “breathing rooms”, in which you don’t need to think much to proceed.

name: Zelda3: Cube
summary:
Inspired by the movie cube, this hack was made as one giant dungeon, which has 10×10 Hyrule Magic rooms. Thus the entire game is one big dungeon, which you need to solve in one sitting and no deaths. Can you do it? Can you find the exit?

This is a short hack, which will sometimes force you to think hard before you will be able to progress, but for the most part is still on par with the difficulty of the original game, with hints when special tricks are needed to progress.

name: Zero Below the Sun
summary: Classic survival horror reimagined with a retro look and modern feel, set in a top secret underground research facility in Antarctica.

name: Zeta Leporis RTS
summary: A sci-fi real-time strategy game. An existential war among asteroids in classic RTS style. Build and defend, produce and upgrade, attack and annihilate!

name: Zen Koi
summary: Zen Koi is a fun, relaxing and stylish mobile game experience from LandShark Games. Grow, breed and collect beautiful Japanese carp as they make their way to mythological dragon form.

name: ZenDots 2: One Dot's Journey
summary:
Find some chaotic serenity, with ZenDots 2! Sprint your way through mazes, paths, and other diverse creations, while avoiding devious obstacles designed to stop you. Choose your path wisely!
Swipe anywhere on the screen to propel the white dot through each of the 48 handcrafted levels. Knock over blocks, pop dots, and collect rings to complete each level’s mission. Only then will the exit be revealed. Dash to the finish to get the fastest time!

name: Zeppelin Armada
summary:
Zeppelin Armada is a new steampunk-themed megawad for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

There's two versions here for download - a "full" version with Steampunk weapons, skins & sounds and a "clean" version with just the maps and the classic Doom weapons.

name: Zero One
summary:
''Zero One'' is a murder mystery game

You and your partner '' CC'' has been tasked with investigating strange suicides taking place in a secluded village. People with no history of mental illness nor suicidal thoughts travel to this village and hang themselves.

Your job is to discover ''the truth''. But what will you truly find? A Sweet Lie? A Bitter Truth? Or maybe a ''Reality''?

name: Zest to Fantasy
summary: The story behind Zest is that you, Zefaa, woke up at a desert after you have been knocked unconscious. You realized that you have lost all of your memory except you first name. Since there are no one around the desert, you decide to find a place to rest and begin the search of your own identity. From here on, you will choose one of the four paths and begin your quest for your past.

name: Zehlar
summary: Explore a world full of secrets and magic, inhabited by creatures with unique elemental abilities. Ally with them to embark on your adventure, and train alongside your creature companions to become stronger and conquer the challenges of the world.

name: Zero Degrees
summary: This is a Third-person shooting indie game. Players will kill zombies, loot, complete quests, level up, and unlock new areas and AI teammates in a semi open map. The game includes day-night system, custom dressing, loot lost on death, and simple hivemind AI.

name: Zen with a Pen
summary: Embark on a mesmerizing journey. Draw lines, guide the enso symbol, and conquer challenging maps. With a minimalistic style, casual (sometimes) yet addictive gameplay, this game offers a perfect blend of relaxation and arcade fun. Can you master each level and achieve true serenity?

name: Zettai Zetsumei Shoujo Kokuu no Houteishiki
summary: Zettai Zetsumei Shoujo Kokuu no Houteishiki is an adventure indie game.

name: Zen Pinball
summary: Think of Zen Pinball as your own personal pinball arcade! This is a free-to-play game with the table "Sorcerer's Lair" included and many more different pinball tables available as in-app purchases.

name: ZeroSpace
summary: ZeroSpace is a cinematic RTS with an epic sci-fi story where your decisions determine the fate of the galaxy. No two matches play the same thanks to nearly limitless combinations of factions, mercenary units and heroes, introducing unparalleled strategic depth and player expression to the genre.

name: Zed Patrol
summary: Zed Patrol is a co-op 3D top-down zombie shooter that puts you in the middle of a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. Your squad's mission: to take out the four bosses and retrieve the keycards to save the city. But with hordes of zombies around every corner, it won't be easy!

name: Zero End: Chapter One
summary: Zero End is a paranormal mystery adult Visual Novel with horror elements where you try to find the truth behind the sinister happenings at Altham Academy.

name: Zen Fisher
summary: Chill out, unwind and embark on a journey in Zen Fisher to collect all unique fish species and rarities in this vast, stylized 3D open world fishing game. Do you have what it takes to unlock the deepest secrets of the world?

name: Zeitghast
summary: Run, dash, shoot, and slash your way through a mechanized prehistoric world in this fast paced platformer-shooter. Keep your eye on the clock while trying to stop an evil mad scientist from disrupting the timeline!

name: Zero Piece
summary: The great age of pirates have began, as a marine it is your duty to keep peace of the world. it`s not an easy adventure. Are you ready to face the challenges ahead to keep peace and stop pirates from roaming around freely? Become an Admiral and lead the marines to stop powerful pirates.

name: Zettai Zetsumei Shoujo: Kokuu no Houteishiki
summary: 30 minutes left until the girl's death... "Zettai Zetsumei Shoujo" is a short science fiction visual novel that pays homage to "Cold Equations" and "Trolley Problem". You will be forced to make a life choice: a girl who stows away on a spaceship to meet her mother, or a group of victims of a space accident waiting to be rescued. Choose the life you want to save and see the girl's fate.

name: Zero no Tsukaima Fantasy Force
summary: Players control Louise as she flies through and shoots down a barrage of enemies in this 2D horizontal shooter inspired by games of the 8 bit era. Collect powerups, use screen clearing magic and try to make it to the end of each stage.

name: Zero no Tsukaima Fantasy Force 2nd Impact
summary: Take to the skies a second time in the sequel to Familiar of Zero: Fantasy Force in a game inspired by 16 bit and arcade games.

name: Zero no Tsukaima: Maigo no Period to Ikusen no Symphony
summary: The story is a separate continuation from the anime and follows the adventures of Saito and Louise when they are tasked with checking out a library after reports of ghosts inhabiting it arise. During the search Louise goes missing, and when they find her Saito and crew discover Louise has lost her memory. The librarian tells them they will need to go into the various books in the library to recover Louise's memory. Saito and friend's adventure into the world of the books then begins. Notable changes from the other entries in the series include the "tsundere meter" being reworked from a notched bar to a gradient circle gauge, while also lacking the turn based combat sections from the first entry.

name: Zelda II: Ocarina of Time
summary:
Ages ago, the Ancient Sages built the Temple of Time to protect the Sacred Realm. Ganondorf, the Gerudo King of Thieves, has Obtained the Triforce of Power and become the King of Evil. The power of the sages lies sleeping in six temples across Hyrule. The time has come for you to awaken as the Hero of Time!

This adaptation takes Link to familiar places and a few new ones. It is designed to be more difficult, more forgiving, and less linear than the vanilla game.

name: Zelda II: The Triforce of Courage
Z Escape
summary: Get to the chopper! Pick up the machine gun and destroy all of the zombies to save your crew!

name: Zero Conflict TD
summary: Fight alien invasion through 30 regions and save the planet. Each level will test you in new and challenging ways. Test your skill and stop the invasion once and for all.

name: Zero Vortex
summary: Get lost in the mind-bending world of Zero Vortex, a retro 6DOF shooter. Navigate disorienting levels, upgrade weapons, and face off against diverse enemies. Immerse yourself in mixed modern-retro graphics and an all-new soundtrack. Prepare for chaos!

name: Zero Target
summary:
Zero Target, known in Japan as Shooting Down King, is a shooter video game developed by Data East and released in 1985 for arcades.
In Zero Target the player controls a fighter plane, with the action seen from a first person view inside of the fighter's cockpit. The player can move the view in any direction, with a targeting reticule in the middle of the screen used to aim at enemy fighters.

name: Zeramida
summary: Short map in a desert reminiscent to EPIC/Epic 2 wads thematically and difficulty wise. Based on a dream I had several months ago about being trapped in a brown bricked dungeon or something with imps and sergeants ahead in an awkward tight space, while outside the view of two twin forts and nothing but sand and stars around, oh and a big wall in the middle. The ending result is a lot more substantial but the dream parts were recreated almost to perfection, aside from detailing.

name: Zen 2212 A.D.
summary: A single Doom 2 map, set in a futuristic dystopian city.

name: Zero Tolerance Origins
summary:
Zero Tolerance Origins on retro cartridges will come with the original game Zero Tolerance and the never released sequel Zero Tolerance Underground, which starts right where the first part ends!

Zero Tolerance was one of the earliest first-person titles ever released on Sega Mega Drive and Genesis and is set in a futuristic world where the universe is swarmed by all possible kinds of evil aliens. As highly skilled member of the Zero Tolerance team, you get called to repel the aliens’ invasion and protect mankind from the enemy.
Fight back the aliens’ attack on the spaceship Europe-1 and repel their invasion on earth in Zero Tolerance and hunt down the invaders on a subway mission in the never before released sequel Zero Tolerance Underground!

name: Zero Tours
summary:
This is a Game Boy Advance RPG from Media Rings Corporation, released on July 27th 2001. It is also known as Mugen Kinogyou Zero Tours.
The game features characters known as Kigurumians (キグルミアン) who like to dress up as different animals. You can battle monsters (known as Nuigurumin) in dungeons and register them. Using a link cable, you may exchange items and Nuigurumin data.

name: ZeroKing
summary: Embark on an electrifying journey in Zero King. Engage in intense battles amidst diverse space arenas. Customize your ship and prove your skills in multiplayer battles. Fast-paced action awaits in this cosmic adventure. Join the ranks, carve your legacy, and become legend. Are you ready for liftoff?

name: Zeldara's Glitch City
summary:
Most SMW hacks are designed to feel like new games that just happen to be based off of SMW. This hack is just the opposite.

Zeldara's Glitch City is intended to be a very strange, unconventional, and otherwise confusingly random hack, that deliberately exploits unusual aspects of the SMW engine (as well as the fact that most SMW hack players are quite familiar with the original SMW's levels) to its advantage. (It also intends to showcase various little-used edits that are possible in SMW hacks.)

name: Zegelon: Hardcore Arena
summary: Zegelon: Hardcore Arena is a fast-paced competitive multiplayer survival game that offers a strategic battle royale hack & slash experience, where players compete in brutal gladiatorial combat for gold and glory, with no second chances.

name: Zero Caliber 2
summary: Get ready to experience the thrill of your life in Zero Caliber 2, the sequel to the critically acclaimed Zero Caliber VR! Cinematic action, explosions, tons of weapons to unlock, a full-blown single player/Co-op campaign, PvP, airstrikes and a VR experience you'll never forget! Coming in 2024.

name: Zedipede
summary: Something is stirring in the mushroom patch! Zedipede is a fast-action arcade game complete with progressive difficulty, high-score table and attract mode. Can you repel wave after wave of attackers? It starts out simple enough but gradually becomes insane. Extra life every 4th level. 100% lightning-fast machine code for the 16K Sinclair ZX81. We think you won't find a better or more complete version of this arcade classic for the Zeddy! Sublime chaos and amazing arcade action for the price, You won't be disappointed. Order now!

name: Zet Zillions
summary: Zet Zillions is a single-player roguelike deckbuilder where you use your cards to make freakish combinations and explode entire planets. BIG-BADDA-BOOM!

name: Zeno
summary:
Losing memories and waking up from a mysterious place, a genius and a homicidal maniac, Maeno Aki and Tsugino Haru.
These two who are handcuffed together, aim for the exit to escape from this place―

name: Zeal-X2
summary:
Zeal-X2 is a 2.5 D platformer in which you take on the role of Redscar.
Here you can slash your way through enemies and make heads roll.

name: Zen Quest
summary: Zen Quest is a relaxing mindfulness game where you design Zen gardens, learn meditation, partake in mindfulness activities, and explore enchanting spirit worlds.

name: Zen Garden
summary: Zen Garden is a relaxing logic game about creating your own Japanese-style garden settings. Through block play and decoration, you can solve puzzles in multiple ways, expressing your imagination and advancing through the story.

name: Zeno no Nichijou
summary: A game about the aftermath after Zeno's E ending.

name: Zero's Fantastic Anecdote
summary: A Danmaku Shooting Game.

name: Zelda 64 1997
summary: A fan recreation of the beta version of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time (back when it was known as Zelda 64). It aims to recreate and expand how the version would look like according to demo footage.

name: Zero Zone 2020
summary: Zero Zone 2020 is a classic Tower defense game where you will need to defend a home base from swarms of enemies

name: Zenonia Chronobreak
summary: Guide the hero through many amazing fights with monsters. Do absorbing tasks and fight monsters. Do absorbing tasks and defeat the powers of evil. Immerse into a fantasy world of this game for Android. Choose from several characters, each with its own history and amazing abilities. Depending on your decisions while playing the game the hero can become evil or good. Defeat a variety of enemies and collect loot.

name: Zendar
summary: Your goal is for your country to prosper while interacting with your neighbours.

name: Zedwolf
summary:
A not-entirely-canon demake of the game 'Zeewolf' by Binary Asylum.

Pilot your Zedwolf chopper across 6.5 km^2 of 3d open world environment, rescue hostages and repel the enemy force's attack!

name: Zero Hero
summary: Zero hero is an endless roguelike, each wave of enemies and unique combinations. Collect Waboshi to buy new weapons and upgrades outside the game and get further and further in the challenges with the number of kills and waves. Challenge yourself with new weapons, new powers and challenges!

name: Zero Distance
summary: Take on the role of a courageous freedom fighter and defeat waves of occupation forces in this bullet heaven. Buy weapons and upgrades between waves and become absurdly powerful against an invading army.

name: Zephinala
summary: In a 2D RPG adventure exploration game, a boy named Saba finds himself in an enchanted world filled with numerous anomalies and mythological creatures. Your goal is to explore this world and find a way back to the real world.

name: Zenith: Nexus
summary: Fight, explore, and lose yourself in an anime-inspired world built for VR. Two action-packed game modes available. How will you use your power?

name: Zero Days Since
summary: A co-op survival horror game where you work as a warehouse associate for the world's fastest growing logistics company. Pick orders and stage them for shipment, but watch your back while you work, you can't shake the feeling that something (or things) is watching you.

name: Zero Protocol
summary: In this Sci-Fi survival horror game, you must uncover the secrets of the IAS Antarctic Research Complex and try to survive. You will find various endings, puzzles, battles with monsters, and an intriguing plot.

name: Zerlizan: The shadow of crime
summary: On a barren planet, lacking resources and marked by harsh living conditions, you find yourself in the role of a young intelligence officer on the outskirts of civilization. In a disciplined society, rooted in a feudalistic system of government and deeply committed to the concept of honor, you are assigned the mission to investigate a possible murder in a impoverished and desertic village...

name: Zerko
summary: A puzzle game filled with shapes, numbers, and a straightforward goal: make every number zero.

name: ZenFire
summary: Very casual click and shoot with some little minigames, reach 20k points to beat the game!

name: Zeitz Machz: Rhapsody
summary: A strange location, an awkward situation, and a mysterious girl: what will these lead to?

name: Zeddytron 2081
summary:
It's the year 2081 and servant robots have become commonplace, though too expensive for most people. In that same year, a large abandoned Sinclair warehouse is discovered with thousands of mint, working ZX81s and some genius decides to build a line of cheap and affordable robots using them: The Zeddytrons.

Based on ZX81s and huge rampacks (by 2081, rampack science has advanced significantly) the Zeddytrons become massively popular and the world fills with them ... until the unexpected happens! Wobblying rampacks cause the Zeddytrons to malfunction and declare mankind an obsolete species!

Your mission is to move through 50 waves, blasting Zeddytrons, avoiding undestructible Zeddyhulks and rescuing human survivors!

You can control your player using AWSD to move and JIKL to shoot simultaneously in 8 directions. Otherwise, you can use OPQAM / Cursor / ZXPand+ Joystick to move and shoot by pressing fire and the direction in which you want to shoot.

Good Luck!

name: Zero King
summary: You are a Junker pilot, with only a buggy droid and a handful of zBits. With the help of fellow Junkers, you will use salvaged parts to customise your starfighters to your unique play style, then pilot them in the Grafter arenas for glory and gain. Design smart, fight hard.

name: Zealot's Curse
summary: Obey your Masters. Destroy your enemies. Created for #7DRL.

name: Zeta Wave Infinity
summary:
Enjoy in this adrenalinic arcade game with the beatiful AI pilots named
ZETA and OMEGA

name: Zeppelin Rescue
summary: Choplifter clone

name: Zerra's Adventure
summary: Zerra's Adventure is a classic turn-based RPG with no random encounters. Explore diverse areas, collect items and treasures to improve your team and defeat the strangest enemies. Level up, learn new attacks, and meet quirky characters on your adventure!

name: Zelda no Densetsu: 4-tsu no Tsurugi +
summary: Zelda no Densetsu: 4-tsu no Tsurugi + is the name of the Japanese (and Korean) version of The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures. This version has an additional game (or mode) called Navi Trackers, which wasn't released in the international version.

name: Zector 7
summary: Fight zombies with your friends in this survival open-world sci-fi. Harvest, Craft, Build, and purchase better gear and vehicles to survive the night. Explore and loot abandoned bases, crashed ships, caves, alien temples, and outposts to become the ultimate survivor.

name: Zelda 64: Shifting Sand Dungeon
summary: A mod which transforms Shifting Sand Land from Super Mario 64 into a dungeon in The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

name: Zeta Wolf: First Bite
summary: Explore the budding friendship between Carly and Siona — two girls whose personalities couldn't be more different! Will their friendship blossom into something more? Or will their selfish desires drive a wedge between them? Find out in this lighthearted prequel to Zeta Wolf Chronicles!

name: Zelda 64: Recompiled - Majora's Mask
summary: A static recompilation of The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask for PC and Linux, with many enhancements like widescreen support, auto saving and higher resolution. It works through Zelda 64: Recompiled.

name: Zelda 64: Recompiled
summary: Zelda 64: Recompiled is a project that uses N64: Recompiled to statically recompile Majora's Mask (and soon Ocarina of Time) into a native port with many new features and enhancements. This project uses RT64 as the rendering engine to provide some of these enhancements.

name: Zenatria
summary: It's time to answer the call, go into battle against the forces of Yurmim to defend the town from the onslaught of enemies.

name: Zelda 64: Recompiled - Ocarina of Time
summary: A static recompilation of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time which aims to add many improvements over the original console version.

name: Zelda II: Paracosm
summary: This is a rom hack designed out of love for Zelda II. It has always had a dreamlike atmosphere to it, and this new adventure really leans into that aspect. Work on this hack started in summer of 2021 with the intention of only making a slightly dreamier variant of the original, but it slowly became its own distinct project. It features new overworlds, towns, dungeons, graphics, and text.

name: Zenith Heroes
summary: Rise to the challenge in Zenith Heroes, the ultimate Battle Royale experience! Dynamic environments, diverse heroes, intense firefights—prove your skills solo or team up to dominate. Constant updates keep the adrenaline pumping. Are you ready for the zenith of gaming?

name: Zen Koi Pro
summary: Unwind and embark on a mesmerizing journey with Zen Koi Pro, a premium, single-player game experience crafted for ultimate relaxation. Inspired by the captivating Asian myth of a koi fish transforming into a dragon, Zen Koi Pro offers a serene escape, brimming with enchanting music and tranquil gameplay.

name: Zebulon: A Lost Cat
summary: Zebulon the cat is lost in a strange place, but he has a lot of courage and curiosity quickly replaces fear as he explores and unravels the world around him. It also helps that smelly green food is everywhere to grab!

name: Zero the Kamikaze Squirrel
summary:
Who said bad guys cannot be heroes? Aero the Acro-Bat’s infamous enemy comes for some ninja squirrel action with an adventure of his own!

While working on Edgar Ektor’s evil plan, Zero receives a letter from his girlfriend telling him their forest is in danger and her father has been kidnapped. When he tells Edgar that he needs to go to protect his forest, Edgar refuses, but Zero’s leaves without permission.

Now Zero needs to head back to his forest as soon as possible, but the evil madman Edgar Ektor doesn’t take a no for an answer and is not planning to make it easy for the hero to go save his beloved forest...

name: Zerouno Games Collection Pack 1
summary: Discover 9 amazing games!

name: Zenith Armada
summary: Embark on interstellar conquest in a 2D space strategy game. Command ships, explore galaxies, engage in real-time battles, and customize your fleet. Traverse hazardous star maps, unlock factions, and strategize for victory. Are you ready to conquer the cosmos?

name: Zero Factory
summary: Embark on a journey from Stone Age to industrial power in Zero Factory, where survival meets automation in a magical, corrupted world. Face bosses, harness artifacts, and build a mechanical empire.

name: Zero-Sum Heart
summary: "I" make a deal with the witch to give up my heart, in exchange for love— from everyone. Is it worth it if losing my heart means gaining *his*?———————————————————————In this short visual novel, make choices and answer the question: is love a zero-sum game?

name: Zelda 64
summary: A beta-style mod for Ocarina of Time.

name: Zero Zero: Perfect Stop
summary: Zero Zero: Perfect Stop is a train driving game for Playdate where you use the crank to control the train's throttle and brakes. Stop in the right place, at the right time. Maintain your timetable as you glide through scenic Yamanashi.

name: Zelda: Forest of the Lost Soul
Zen Drift
summary: A new way to experience car drifting. Enjoy every turn in a calm and easy driving. Just let your car drift and slide down the road. Catch the Zen!

name: Zero Tolerance
summary: An small mapset containing 7 maps in total made for Lutrov's 1024 contest by Dutch Devil

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.1 - Undercover R&B
summary: Zenless Zone Zero 1.1 released on August 14, 2024, adding more story content, new characters and a bunch of changes to the base game. Including new game-play content and balance changes.

name: Zen Training
summary: Zen Training is a beautiful and unique puzzle game. The title combines puzzle dynamics with those of a rhythm-game. It has been designed to be the definitive pastime. The game is set in a classic Japanese Zen garden and is based on the concepts of Order and Chaos. In the heart of the garden there is a maple tree around which are located 5 stones with 5 different colored symbols to which correspond “mana stones” falling from the tree. The player's task is to match symbols and colors in order to promote Order and Harmony, flowing trough an infinite series of standard and bonus levels.

name: Zero Hour: Kill Zone
summary: Nintendo Switch exclusive! High-quality graphics show battlefield reality. Team-based tactical gameplay with comrades. FPS with excitement and precise gun control!

name: Zen Rage
summary: Zen Rage is a virtual stress ball game that allows players to vent frustration by digitally destroying their desktop or preset backgrounds with a variety of tools. Drawing inspiration from the 90s classic Desktop Destroyer, the game offers a fresh take on chaotic, cathartic destruction. Players can use tools like chainsaws, hammers, machine guns, Tesla-coil rifles, and more to wreak havoc. In addition to freeform destruction, Zen Rage includes a campaign mode where a scientist guides players through a series of tasks and mini-games, culminating in a humorous and unexpected twist.

name: Zero Escape: Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors
summary:
The first game in the Zero Escape series, originally made as a standalone title "Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors". The Zero Escape rebranding and alternative cover of the game were released alongside its sequel in the "Zero Escape: The Nonary Games".

This version features updated artwork, voice acting, the choice of novel and adventure mode's and the addition of the FLOW Chart, along with other changes to adapt the game for a single screen from the original's two screens.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.2 - Tour de Inferno
summary:
Version 1.2 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Caesar and Burnice
• New Main Story Quest: Chapter 4 - Tour de Inferno
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.3 - Virtual Revenge
summary:
Version 1.3 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Yanagi and Lighter
• New Game Mode: Simulated Battle Trial
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Zero to Dance Hero
summary: Become a Dance Hero from Zero! Grab your Joy-Con controllers, and get your body moving to the beat! Learn popular hip-hop dance moves from basic to complex. But you won't be alone on your dancing journey. Four instructors help along the way!

name: Zen Pinball World
summary: Zen Pinball World brings you the latest and greatest pinball tables to mobile! Dive into the next evolution of pinball mastery from Zen Studios, inspired by the biggest entertainment brands.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.4 - A Storm of Falling Stars
summary:
Version 1.4 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Miyabi and Harumasa
• New Main Story Quest: A Storm of Falling Stars
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Zenpu-kun
summary: A Shogi application developed by Hiroshi Yamashita utilizing his award winning YSS (Yamashita Shogi System) program. The AI system developed in this game would be implemented by Yamashita in collaboration with I4 in their AI Shogi series.

name: Zen Beauty
summary: Beautiful women in swimsuits, a picturesque courtyard, and flashes of inspiration captured from the mind—this is an idle game that requires minimal operation. A wide variety of decorations and outfits can be purchased using points earned through idling.

name: Zenoken
summary:
A stealthy space opera metroidvania where actions have consequences.
The stars call the Chinokitsune a space pirate--& often an assassin--but stranded on a strange alien world after a failed heist, It's up to you to reckon with your own past & motivations to thwart an ancient evil & maybe find love.

name: Zeta Force
summary: Zeta Force is a game that was bundled into the Electro Choice MGX arcade machine. The game was developed by Arcadia and released in 1990. Currently there is no information about the game online apart from a promotional poster mentioning the game, thus making it lost media.

name: Zeromiss
summary:
A fresh combination of roguelike and shooting games!
This is the game for you, Zero Miss.

name: Zephyr
summary: Zephyr is a made by Scotty in 1 week for their 2024 wiki and with some Speed of Doom influence.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.5 - Astra-nomical Moment
summary:
Version 1.5 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Astra and Evelyn
• New Outfits for Ellen, Nicole and Astra
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Zeizen
summary: Ultra-violent point & click set in Shanghai, China.

name: Zero Jikan he...
summary: A gigantic meteorite will fall on the Earth in 3 days destroying it forever. At this time one amateur astronomer's photo of the comet tail initiated a series of full-scale riots and mayhem. How will you live three last days in such a world?

name: Zexion
summary: Seek out new weapons and equipment to delve deeper into the dangerous world of Cypher-X72! Be warned, you aren't the only one seeking the forbidden technology known as Zexion! It will take cunning and valor to succeed in this action-packed sci-fi adventure!

name: Zenomatrix
summary: ZENOMATRIX is the first ever game to seamlessly combine puzzle-solving and horror, navigate a surreal realm inspired by early 90's CGI experiments as you engage in first-person conundrums against creatures that only move to attack when not directly observed.

name: ZenGM Hockey
summary: A free browser-based sports team management game where you are the general manager of an ice hockey team.

name: ZenGM Baseball
summary: A free, browser-based sports management game where you are the general manager of a baseball team of your choice.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.6 - Among the Forgotten Ruins
summary:
Version 1.6 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Soldier 0 - Anby and Trigger
• New Main Story Quest: Bury Your Tears With the Past - Part 1
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Zero Glide VR
summary: A virtual reality motorcycle game.

name: ZetaZania Part 1: Vampire Pirates from Uranus
summary: A 2D sci-fi action-adventure side-scrolling platformer, with a rich storyline, immersive music and retro-style pixellated graphics. Featuring quirky British humour, challenging maze-like levels, complex visual puzzles and an in-game upgrades system to upgrade your arsenal to defend against enemies.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.7 - Bury Your Tears With the Past
summary:
Version 1.7 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Vivian and Hugo
• New Main Story Quest: Bury Your Tears With the Past - Part 2
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Zenkoku Baken Ouja Ketteisen 2: Omoshiro Bamei S
Zenkoku Baken Ouja Ketteisen 2: Satella Mile Yosen 1
Zebra
summary:
This short maze game is inspired by Op-Art pioneers like Reginald Neal. It combines two ideas: first, your brain can easily segment areas of an image based on the direction of shading, without any color or tone information to help… making the game quite playable. Second, this kind of image causes conflict as your eyeball moves, making it really annoying to play.

I used it as a talking point in my microtalk on optical effects in games, from GDC 2016.

This is the second time I hid an assignment for my prototypes in a game. See if you can find the secret prompt.

name: Zelda Again: Link Is Adventuresome
summary: Zelda Again: Link Is Adventuresome is a fan made remaster of Zelda II: The Adventure of Link with the intent to add more content to the game. This remaster ports the classic NES sequel to the first The Legend of Zelda but includes several new minor gameplay tweaks and features such as tons of quality of life improvements, widescreen, new areas on the overworld to explore, new collectibles and upgrades, revamped dungeon and overworld layouts and a brand new post game quest and final boss featured only in the game's new game plus mode, the 2nd Quest.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 2.0 - Where Clouds Embrace the Dawn
summary:
Marking the start of Zenless Zone Zero's Season 2, Version 2.0 includes:
• New Characters: Yixuan, Ju Fufu, and Pan Yinhu
• New Main Story Quest: Where Clouds Embrace the Dawn
• New region: Waifei Peninsula
• New gameplay mechanics, events, and anniversary celebrations
• ...and more!

name: Zerium War: Destiny
summary: Battle through waves of invaders in Zerium War: Destiny, a sci-fi Roguelite RPG. As Earth's core guardian, wield auto-shooting skills to grow stronger. Face random challenges and gear up for each victory.

name: Zenzicube: The Power of Six
summary: Recruit, train, and manage a team of heroes to vanquish the dastardly Six Stars. In short, round-based sessions, send them on quests that match their skills to maximize rewards. Explore a town of colorful characters and engage in action-based combat.

name: Zero Moment
summary: You wake up trapped in a derelict generation ship. It was humanity's last hope. Your only ally is a suit fused to your skin. It's whispering instructions into your ear. Survive and uncover a mystery thousands of years in the making.

name: Zeppelin Rush
summary: A Tower Offense game in which you deploy goblin manned zeppelins in an effort to earn money and destroy the dwarven fortress.

name: Zekertune
summary: Zekertune is the music rhythm game that will put your reflexes and sense of rhythm to the ultimate test! Dive into an immersive world of music where every tap counts.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 2.1 - The Impending Crash of Waves
summary:
Version 2.1 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New outfits
• New summer events
• ...and more!

summary: Scavenge, craft, and fight to survive in a post-pixel apocalypse. Explore dangerous biomes, wield guns and magic, and uncover a hidden truth buried in chaos. Every choice matters. Will you survive?

summary: Pinball table based on The Walking Dead from Telltale.

name: Zen Pinball 2: Portal Pinball
summary: Aperature Laboratories presents the Heuristic Portal Pinball Device proving that science is not merely beneficial but also quite fun.
