Zen Pinball: Star Wars Pinball - Solo
summary: Star Wars Pinball: Solo expands Zen Pinball with three tables based on Han Solo's early adventures. Players can recreate pivotal moments from the Solo film, including Han's first encounters with Chewbacca and Lando Calrissian, plus the legendary Kessel Run in the Millennium Falcon. The Calrissian Chronicles table follows Lando's journey from gambler to Rebel hero, while the Battle of Mimban table puts players in command of Imperial forces during Han's military service. Each table incorporates missions and mechanics that reflect key story elements from the Star Wars universe.

name: Zen Pinball: Star Wars Pinball - Calrissian Chronicles
Zen Pinball: Star Wars Pinball - Battle of Mimban
Zen Pinball: Star Wars Pinball - The Last Jedi
summary: Star Wars Pinball: The Last Jedi adds two tables based on Episode VIII of the saga. Players can participate in scenes from the film through various game modes, including training Rey on Ahch-To, battling TIE fighters, and controlling BB-8 to infiltrate Snoke's command ship. The tables feature multiball challenges aboard the Millennium Falcon and Force-guided gameplay in darkness, while incorporating character interactions between Luke, Rey, Finn, Chewbacca, and BB-8. Special modes include R2-D2's holographic memories and encounters between Chewbacca and the Porgs.

Zenvader
summary: Zenvader is a super retro shooter mixed with roguelite elements. Dodge the barrage of bullets, improve your unit, and try to defeat the Alien King!

name: Zereoton Hauntings
summary: Zereoton Hauntings is a 2D top-down survival horror game based on the story of a paranormal enthusiast called Mateo who loves to investigate the various haunted locations in the US.

name: ZeroZeta
summary: ZeroZeta is a minimal, precision racing game with chill ambient music. Glide through hand-crafted levels, chase personal bests, and discover the flow of perfect runs.

name: Zero Parades: For Dead Spies
summary: From ZA/UM comes ZERO PARADES: For Dead Spies – a story-rich espionage RPG. You're a brilliant but tormented operant on a desperate assignment. Pick up the pieces of your broken network, untangle a bloody web of intrigue at the End of History, and prove yourself on the big stage or blow it all up – again.

name: Zeroth
summary: Zeroth is a run-based action platformer with mechanical depth and interplay inspired by traditional Roguelikes. Learn the rules of Zeroth through hilarious deaths and guide your heroes as they seek to escape the 0th circle of Haell.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 2.2 - Do Not Go Gentle Into That Good Night
summary:
Version 2.2 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:
• New Characters: Seed and Orphie & Magus
• New Main Story Quest: Do Not Go Gentle Into That Good Night
• New events
• ...and more!

name: Zero Tenshi: Blue Sun
summary: Find the red buttons hidden in the world of your dreams and discover your destiny.

name: Zerun
summary: A fast–paced ritual run across magical worlds. Walk the path of the shaman. Solve ancient puzzles, survive the trials, and gather what’s needed to heal your world. Earn every artifact, complete every rite, and bring your world back to life.

name: Zen Forest Brick Breaker VR
summary: Grab your paddles and let's break some bricks! Classic 2D gameplay re-imagined for VR! Choose your vibe: calm & relaxing or fast & frantic! More retro arcade action than you can break a brick at!

name: Zenith Realms
summary: Guide Ninami on a heartfelt journey through the realms of a fractured planet. Solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden secrets, and piece together the truth of a shattering past with a mysterious raven.

name: Zen Paint
summary: A peaceful color-by-numbers game set on a hexagonal grid. Play at your own pace and relax while you complete a variety of levels with differing themes, sizes and complexities.

name: Zelda's Adventure Remastered
summary:
This is a remaster of Zelda's Adventure, originally for the Philips CD-i, developed using GameMaker Studio 2.

Includes a Classic Mode, which plays roughly the same as the original, and a Remastered Mode, which includes various QoL changes as well as restored cut content!

Other features of this remaster include but are not limited to:
Smooth 60fps gameplay, subtitles for cutscenes and ingame dialogue, rebindable controls, better looped ambience sound/music, stereo panned sound effects and localization options (currently only English and Dutch are available).

As of the current demo it should be possible currently to beat the first dungeon, the Shrine of Earth.

name: Zero Point Survivor
summary: Collect up to 21 unique weapons and wreck machines, kill space squids and blast asteroids into bits. Gather valuable gold and spend it for upgrades and new ships as you venture deeper into the depths of space, to the Point of No Return.

name: Zerion 12
summary: A sci-fi tower defense game. Create futuristic towers of various types to destroy hordes of aliens that come in waves. Build up resources to create more towers, repair, upgrade etc. Earn rewards for accomplishing certain tasks.

name: Zentore: Muscle Your Brain
summary: A fitness game that combines brain training with muscle training.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 2.3 - Memories of Dreams Bygone
summary:
Version 2.3 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:
• New Characters: Lucia, Yidhari and Komano Manato
• New Main Story Quest: Memories of Dreams Bygone
• New events
• ...and more!

name: Zen Simulator
summary: Unwind with this meditation game, guided by the calming sound of the wooden fish. Clear your mind, relieve stress, boost focus, and improve sleep—all in just a few minutes of peaceful gameplay.

name: Zelensky vs Poroshenko: The Destiny of Ukraine
Z Evil Road
summary: ★ Z-Evil Road is Advanced Tower Defense game with many mechanics, find a perfect strategy for every challenge and become master of defending base !

name: Zeitgeist
summary: You wake up in a small underground bunker. The world outside is fubar. You had a vision of strange phone numbers in your dream. You feel compelled to call these numbers. Use the telephone in the lonely booth outside and get closer to an understanding of what happened.

name: Zemsky Sobor
summary: Russia, emerging from the Time of Troubles, faces a new trial. Kirsha, a battle-hardened Cossack, is pulled into a whirlwind of events as factions fight for the throne. The Assembly of the Land promises order—but the path to it is paved with intrigue and betrayal. Experience an action-adventure set in 17th-century Russia, with brutal combat and the ominous mood of uncertain times.

name: Zeverland
summary: Welcome to Zeverland. Common sense is your best weapon against the Zeds. After figuring out the "not dying" part, grab some friends to save the world. Find a cure, build a rocket, or a tower too high for Zeds to climb. Nothing's off limits. You're here at the very start of the apocalypse. Go wild!

name: Zep
summary: Fish with minigames and fight while dodging! As the fisherman Zep, you'll have to fish, meet, and help the residents of Muutu while restoring the island to its former glory. Sail the seas and don't let any of those fish* escape! (*Give them a home instead!)

name: Zenith
summary: Step into a dark and decaying world with Zenith, an Action RPG that blends intense combat, deep exploration, and an immersive atmosphere. Explore ruined cathedrals and gothic landscapes filled with secrets, facing relentless enemies that will challenge your skill and strategy.

name: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link SNES
Zenless Zone Zero: Update 2.4 - On the Precipice of the Abyss
summary:
Version 2.4 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:
• New Characters: Dialyn and Banyue
• New Main Story Quest
• New events
• ...and more!

name: Zenith Trace
summary: Zenith Trace is a dark and intense offroad racing game set on an infernal island where the elements have gone wild. Ash-filled air, molten lakes, scorched terrain, and punishing trails become your battleground.

name: Zerowake Gates
summary: Enter a battlefield where madness and desire collide. Pair Espers and Guides for powerful synergy, and join Han Gaon as he uncovers the meteor’s secret and fights to survive a world under alien invasion.

name: Zero Orders Tactics: Supporter Pack
summary:
As a humble thank you, this Supporter Pack offers some unique cosmetics:
Your glowing god hand in the main menu: A reminder of who holds the true power in the game (that’s you!).
The glow follows you everywhere: Your hand-cursor will sparkle and glow inside the game too!

name: Zero Orders Tactics: Under
summary: The entire new 7th faction, +31 units, + 3 heroes, + 3 boss fights

name: Zero Orders Tactics
summary: Terraforming is your weapon! An experimental puzzle strategy where you are not commanding your troops - now, you are shaping the battlefield itself! Nothing is random*, everything is predictable*, and the battlefield is changing. Every turn. By you.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 2.5 - To Be Fuel for the Night
summary:
Version 2.5 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:
• New Characters: Ye Shunguang and Zhao
• New Main Story Quest
• New events
• New skins for Jane and Ye Shunguang
• ...and more!

name: Zen Wash
summary: Wash away the dirt in a calm and relaxing way, surrounded by soothing sounds of nature and the gentle flow of a nearby river.

name: Zero-5
summary: Zero-5 is a shooter where players control the Perseus space fighter as a Space Hound recruited by DEFCON to defend Earth from the Morphon alien race in 2044. The Morphons detected and destroyed the Europa III satellite, prompting their invasion to eliminate humanity. Players engage in combat missions that require defending against and counterattacking the alien forces before they reach the planet. The title features 3D graphics and was inspired by the 1984 space opera film The Last Starfighter, though players without multiple disk drives experienced frequent disk swapping during gameplay.

name: Zeroad
summary: ZEROAD is an endless pixel-art roguelike shooter. Fight through shifting roads and zombie hordes, growing stronger every run. Find unique weapons with modifiers, level up your character, and push further each time – solo or in two-player co-op!

name: Zenku
summary: Think about sudoku, but reinvented!

name: Zelene Lux: Spirit Notes
summary: Free the trapped souls of your friends from a haunted manor. Solve cryptic riddles, find hidden objects, and restore a sanctuary to banish the cult of Magister Vane!

name: Ze Bomber
summary: Free Bomber game
